heading: This Evening
text: Mostly clear, mixing with clouds in the evening. Temperatures in the low 80s are dropping into the 70s after sunset.
Mostly clear, mixing with clouds in the evening. Temperatures in the low 80s are dropping into the 70s after sunset.

heading: Tonight
text: Some evening clouds, then clearing and mild. Areas of river valley fog. Lows in the upper 50s northwest, upper 40s southeast.

heading: Monday
text: Valley fog burning off to sunshine. Less warm. Highs in the upper 70s to around 80. Winds in the North Country and along the Champlain Valley increase to 10-15 mph tomorrow; near 5 mph elsewhere.
